secure_payment: Pay securely—we use SSL encryption to keep your data safe
charge_notice: You will be charged the total amount once your order is confirmed.
authorization_notice: If confirmation isn't received instantly, an authorization for the total amount will be held until your booking is confirmed.
cancel_notice: You can cancel for free up to 24 hours before the day of the experience, local time.
